data.quote: “Day by day.”
data.author: John Rambo

data.quote: If you'll believe in me, I'll believe in you.
data.author: The Unicorn

data.quote: Life is a great deal more complicated in this red uniform.
data.author: Worf

data.quote: If you define yourself by the power to take life, the desire to dominate, to possess…then you have nothing.
data.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

data.quote: The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: When you want to know how things really work, study them when they're coming apart.
data.author: William Gibson

data.quote: And above all things, never think that you're not good enough yourself. A man should never think that. My belief is that in life people will take you at your own reckoning.
data.author: Isaac Asimov

data.quote: A society that gets rid of all its troublemakers goes downhill.
data.author: Robert A. Heinlein

data.quote: I like coffee exceedingly...
data.author: H.P. Lovecraft

data.quote: I'm not going out of my way looking for devils; but I wouldn't step out of my path to let one go by.
data.author: Conan the Barbarian

data.quote: To achieve anything, you must be prepared to dabble on the boundary of disaster.
data.author: Sir Stirling Moss

data.quote: A ship in port is safe, but that is not what ships are for. Sail out to sea and do new things.
data.author: Grace Hopper

data.quote: Hack the Planet!
data.author: Zero Cool

data.quote: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers.
data.author: Steve Wozniak

data.quote: Nobody's gonna put me in a balloon again!
data.author: Debbie Stone

data.quote: Listen to them--the children of the night. What music they make!
data.author: Count Dracula

data.quote: If you can't give me poetry, can't you give me poetical science?
data.author: Ada Lovelace

data.quote: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
data.author: Nikola Tesla

data.quote: I have learned to use the word 'impossible' with the greatest caution.
data.author: Werner von Braun

data.quote: Mars is there, waiting to be reached.
data.author: Buzz Aldrin
